description.label: Label for the field.
description.name: The name of the field (html name='')
description.autocomplete: Browser automatically completes the input values based on values that the user has entered before
description.icon: Adds a icon before the input field (string)
description.radius: If any special type of rounded corners should be used (none, xs, sm, md, lg)
description.hideLabel: This will remove the visible label. Label will be auditible for screen readers.
description.multiline: Render textarea instead of input. Boolean or number of rows to render.
description.borderless: Removes the border around the input field
description.fieldAttributeList: Attributes for field element. Valid input attributes are casted to here from attributesList.
